nodes.text: The Coordinator Droid CO-41 was a model of supervisor droid produced by the Okara Droid Company. A number of CO-41 droids worked in one section of the Okara Droid Factory on the planet Balmorra.
The Coordinator Droid CO-41 appears a type of enemy in the Bounty Hunter class mission "Chaos at the Droid Factory" in the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic.
